sourcesContent: import Link from 'next/link' import NavStyles from './styles/NavStyles' import User from './User' import Signout from './Signout' import CartCount from './CartCount' import { Mutation } from 'react-apollo' import { TOGGLE_CART_MUTATION } from './Cart' const Nav = () => ( {({ data: { me } }) => ( shop {me && ( <> sell orders account {(toggleCart) => ( )} )} {!me && ( Sign In )} )} ) export default Nav
